settings.title: Certification Programs
settings.content: Choose from our comprehensive range of specialized certification tracks

settings.title: Certified Ride Inspector (CRI)
settings.content:
Duration: 120 hours | Format: Online + Practical

Comprehensive training in ride inspection procedures, safety systems, and regulatory compliance. Covers mechanical, electrical, and structural inspection techniques.

Prerequisites: High school diploma, basic mechanical knowledge

Certification Validity: 3 years with continuing education requirements

Investment: $2,495

settings.title: Safety Management Professional (SMP)
settings.content:
Duration: 80 hours | Format: Online + Case Studies

Advanced program covering safety management systems, risk assessment, incident investigation, and regulatory compliance strategies.

Prerequisites: 2+ years industry experience or relevant degree

Certification Validity: 3 years with annual updates

Investment: $1,895

settings.title: Maintenance Excellence Certificate (MEC)
settings.content:
Duration: 100 hours | Format: Blended Learning

Specialized maintenance certification focusing on preventive and predictive maintenance strategies for optimal facility operations.

Prerequisites: Maintenance experience or technical background

Certification Validity: 5 years with professional development units

Investment: $2,195

settings.title: Certification Process
settings.content: Simple steps to advance your professional credentials

settings.title: 1. Choose Your Program
settings.content: Select the certification that aligns with your career goals and current experience level. Our advisors are available to help you make the right choice.

settings.title: 2. Complete Training
settings.content: Engage with expert-led content through our interactive online platform, supplemented by hands-on practical sessions when required.

settings.title: 3. Pass Assessment
settings.content: Demonstrate your knowledge through comprehensive examinations and practical evaluations designed to test real-world application.

settings.title: 4. Receive Certification
settings.content: Upon successful completion, receive your official certification and join our network of certified safety professionals.
